title.narrative: Capacity building, dialogue, and networking for religious leaders, Cambodia

description.narrative:
Continued Learning Organisation: 1. Organize workshops to educate Christian religious leaders in dialogue with other religious leaders.
Peace Bridges Organisation: 1. The project will gather Christian leadership from two areas and build up their leadership and peacebuilding capacities, so they can address fear and misunderstanding about environmental issues. 2. Provide training on Green Interfaith Dialogue. 3. Establishing a peacebuilding alliance to engage ongoing learning, networking and support.

The grant is given to the organisation due to their application to the COVID-19 Emergency Pool (Nødpulje) in order for the organisation to continue their skills development activities in India. Due to COVID-19 restrictions, planned development activities are in risk of closure, which would negatively affect results.
The goal of the development project is strengthening religious activity in small communities in order to improve cooperation between communities, the environment, and establishing engaging networks.
